law.text: Judicial review of the action of the Finance and Administration Cabinet and its secretary and the Department for Facilities Management and its commissioner in the award, or modification, of a lease pursuant to KRS 43.050, 48.111, and 56.800 to 56.823 shall be limited to determining whether a lease or modification to a lease was procured by fraud or was awarded arbitrarily or capriciously.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 47, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 512, sec. 12, effective July 13, 1990.
